Declare your independence from traffic and tolls this July 4th holiday by taking our Port Jervis & Pascack Valley Line service to celebrate our nation's birthday! Weekend Busing Between Port Jervis and Middletown June 25 - 26

Weekend busing will be in effect between Port Jervis and Middletown for select trains starting on Saturday, June 25 at 12:01 AM through Sunday, June 26. Buses will connect with the trains at Middletown Station. Buses will follow the train schedule. Regular westbound service will resume Sunday with the 7:51 PM leaving Middletown. Regular eastbound service will resume Monday with the 3:50 AM leaving Port Jervis. See full details at http://bit.ly/1OeT9iG This service change accommodates repairs on a bridge in Port Jervis, and perform various track improvements. We appreciate your patience during these service improvements.

Weekend Busing Between Port Jervis and Middletown June 25 - 26

Weekend busing will be in effect between Port Jervis and Middletown for select trains starting on Saturday, June 25 at 12:01 AM through Sunday, June 26. Buses will connect with the trains at Middletown Station. Buses will follow the train schedule. Regular westbound service will resume Sunday with the 7:51 PM leaving Middletown. Regular eastbound service will resume Monday with the 3:50 AM leaving Port Jervis. See full details at http://bit.ly/1OeT9iG This service change accommodates repairs on a bridge in Port Jervis, and perform various track improvements. We appreciate your patience during these service improvements.
Weekday Off-peak Busing For Select Port Jervis Line Trains June 20 - 24

Weekday off-peak busing will be in effect at all stations for select trains on the Port Jervis Line for one week beginning Mon., June 20 through Friday, June 24. Buses will follow the train schedules, and will connect with the trains at Ramsey-Route 17 Station. See full details at http://bit.ly/1RYxndI This service change allows us to continue Signal System improvements on the Port Jervis Line. We appreciate your patience during these service improvements.

Weekday off-peak busing will be in effect at all stations for select trains on the Port Jervis Line for one week beginning Mon., June 20 through Friday, June 24. Weekend Busing Between Port Jervis and Middletown June 25 - 26

Weekend busing will be in effect between Port Jervis and Middletown for select trains starting on Saturday, June 25 at 12:01 AM through Sunday, June 26. Buses will connect with the trains at Middletown Station. Buses will follow the train schedule. Regular westbound service will resume Sunday with the 7:51 PM leaving Middletown. Regular eastbound service will resume Monday with the 3:50 AM leaving Port Jervis. See full details at http://bit.ly/1OeT9iG This service change accommodates repairs on a bridge in Port Jervis, and perform various track improvements. We appreciate your patience during these service improvements.

N Line - Weekend and Weekday Planned Service Change

All times until Spring 2017 Astoria-bound N trains skip 86 St, Avenue U, Kings Hwy, 20 Av, 18 Av, New Utrecht Av, and Fort Hamilton Pkwy. N trains stop at Bay Pkwy and 8 Av. To 86 St, Avenue U, and Kings Hwy, take the Astoria-bound N to Bay Pkwy and transfer to a Coney Island-bound N. To 20 Av, 18 Av, New Utrecht Av, and Fort Hamilton Pkwy, take the Astoria-bound N to 8 Av and transfer to a Coney Island-bound N. From these stations, take a Coney Island-bound N to Bay Pkwy or Stillwell Av and transfer to an Astoria-bound N. Or, from New Utrecht Av-62 St, take the D instead. Transfer to an Astoria-bound N at 36 St.

QMT - Fast-track Sandy restoration work at the QMT starts June 9, 2016. Starting Thursday, June 9, 2016 the Manhattan-bound tube of the Queens-Midtown Tunnel will close an hour earlier on weeknights. Weeknight closures will be Monday - Thursday evenings from 9:30pm until 5:30am. Weekend tube closures will be Friday and Saturday evenings from 11:00pm - 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.

Starting Thursday, June 9, 2016 the Brooklyn-bound tube of the Hugh L. Carey Tunnel will close an hour earlier on weeknights. Weeknight closures will be Monday-Friday evenings from 8:30 pm until 5:30am. Saturday evening closures remain the same, 11:00pm to 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.

Weekday Off-peak Busing For Select Port Jervis Line Trains June 20- 24

Weekday off-peak busing will be in effect at all stations for select trains on the Port Jervis Line for one week beginning Mon., June 20 through Friday, June 24. Buses will follow the train schedules, and will connect with the trains at Ramsey-Route 17 Station. See full details at http://bit.ly/1RYxndI This service change allows us to continue Signal System improvements on the Port Jervis Line. We appreciate your patience during these service improvements.
Grand Central Bound Trains Will Not Stop at Melrose Today Sun., June 19; Substitute Buses Operate Between Tremont and Melrose

Grand Central Bound Trains will not stop at Melrose on Sun., June 19 to accommodate track work. Weekend southbound busing will take place between Tremont and Melrose stations. Southbound customers traveling to Melrose station will be provided with connecting bus service from Tremont to Melrose. For all southbound customers at Melrose Station buses will be provided to Tremont for connecting train service. See full bus/train schedule details at http://bit.ly/1qP3iaC We appreciate your patience during this service improvement.

QMT - Fast-track Sandy restoration work at the QMT starts June 9, 2016. Starting Thursday, June 9, 2016 the Manhattan-bound tube of the Queens-Midtown Tunnel will close an hour earlier on weeknights. Weeknight closures will be Monday - Thursday evenings from 9:30pm until 5:30am. Weekend tube closures will be Friday and Saturday evenings from 11:00pm - 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. QMT - Fast-track Sandy restoration work at the QMT starts June 9, 2016. Starting Thursday, June 9, 2016 the Manhattan-bound tube of the Queens-Midtown Tunnel will close an hour earlier on weeknights. Weeknight closures will be Monday - Thursday evenings from 9:30pm until 5:30am. Weekend tube closures will be Friday and Saturday evenings from 11:00pm - 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.

Starting Thursday, June 9, 2016 the Brooklyn-bound tube of the Hugh L. Carey Tunnel will close an hour earlier on weeknights. Weeknight closures will be Monday-Friday evenings from 8:30 pm until 5:30am. Saturday evening closures remain the same, 11:00pm to 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.

Grand Central Bound Trains Will Not Stop at Melrose This Weekend June 18-19; Substitute Buses Operate Between Tremont and Melrose

Grand Central Bound Trains will not stop at Melrose on Sat., June 18 & Sun., June 19 to accommodate track work. Weekend southbound busing will take place between Tremont and Melrose stations. Southbound customers traveling to Melrose station will be provided with connecting bus service from Tremont to Melrose. For all southbound customers at Melrose Station buses will be provided to Tremont for connecting train service. See full bus/train schedule details at http://bit.ly/1qP3iaC We appreciate your patience during this service improvement.

QMT - Fast-track Sandy restoration work at the QMT starts June 9, 2016. Starting Thursday, June 9, 2016 the Manhattan-bound tube of the Queens-Midtown Tunnel will close an hour earlier on weeknights. Weeknight closures will be Monday - Thursday evenings from 9:30pm until 5:30am. Weekend tube closures will be Friday and Saturday evenings from 11:00pm - 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.

Starting Thursday, June 9, 2016 the Brooklyn-bound tube of the Hugh L. Carey Tunnel will close an hour earlier on weeknights. Weeknight closures will be Monday-Friday evenings from 8:30 pm until 5:30am. Saturday evening closures remain the same, 11:00pm to 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.

LIRR Service for Munford & Sons Concerts at Forest Hills Stadium, June 16 & 17

For all southbound customers at Melrose Station buses will be provided to Tremont for connecting train service. Weeknight closures will be Monday - Thursday evenings from 9:30pm until 5:30am. Weekend tube closures will be Friday and Saturday evenings from 11:00pm - 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.

HLC - FAST TRACK SANDY RESTORATION WORK

Starting Thursday, June 9, 2016 the Brooklyn-bound tube of the Hugh L. Carey Tunnel will close an hour earlier on weeknights. Weeknight closures will be Monday-Friday evenings from 8:30 pm until 5:30am. Saturday evening closures remain the same, 11:00pm to 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.

Weeknight closures will be Monday - Thursday evenings from 9:30pm until 5:30am. Weekend tube closures will be Friday and Saturday evenings from 11:00pm - 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.

Twenty trains operate from Penn Station to Belmont Park today for Belmont Stakes beginning 9:39AM. Customers from LI connect with Belmont trains leaving Jamaica starting 10:06AM. Purchase round-trip rail tickets in advance. Return trains will continue through 10PM for those attending the concert after the last race.

Hempstead Branch Service Reduced Sat. June 11

Hempstead Branch service will be reduced from once every hour to every two hours on Saturday afternoon & evening, June 11, between 3PM & 10PM in order to accommodate added service to/from Belmont Park for Belmont Stakes Day. Pick up the Special Timetable for all Hempstead Branch travel on Saturday, June 11 or see http://web.mta.info/lirr/Timetable/Hempstead_BelmontStakesReducedService_June_11_2016.pdf.
Alcohol Prohibited on LIRR this Weekend, June 11-12

To maintain orderly travel for those attending the Belmont Stakes and Puerto Rican Day Parade, alcohol will not be allowed on LIRR trains, stations and platforms starting 7 AM Sat. June 11 through 11:59 PM Sun. June 12. MTA police will confiscate any alcoholic beverages brought onto the property.

Twenty trains operate from Penn Station to Belmont Park on Sat., June 11 for Belmont Stakes beginning 9:39AM. Customers from LI connect with Belmont trains leaving Jamaica starting 10:06AM. Purchase round-trip rail tkts in advance. Return trains will continue through 10PM for those attending the concert after the last race.

QUEENS MIDTOWN TUNNEL - FAST TRACK SANDY RESTORATION WORK

Starting Thursday, June 9, 2016 the Manhattan-bound tube of the Queens-Midtown Tunnel will close an hour earlier on weeknights. Weeknight closures will be Monday - Thursday evenings from 9:30pm until 5:30am. Weekend tube closures will be Friday and Saturday evenings from 11:00pm - 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.
HUGH L. CAREY TUNNEL - FAST TRACK SANDY RESTORATION WORK

Starting Thursday, June 9, 2016 the Brooklyn-bound tube of the Hugh L. Carey Tunnel will close an hour earlier on weeknights. Weeknight closures will be Monday-Friday evenings from 8:30 pm until 5:30am. Saturday evening closures remain the same, 11:00pm to 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.

HUGH L. CAREY TUNNEL - FAST TRACK SANDY RESTORATION WORK

Starting Thursday, June 9, 2016 the Brooklyn-bound tube of the Hugh L. Carey Tunnel will close an hour earlier on weeknights. Weeknight closures will be Monday-Friday evenings from 8:30 pm until 5:30am. Saturday evening closures remain the same, 11:00pm to 8:00am, with some full weekend tube closures to be determined. Two-way traffic will run in the alternate tube. Motorists should expect delays and allow additional travel time.

Pick up the Special Timetable for all Hempstead Branch travel on Saturday, June 11 or see http://web.mta.info/lirr/Timetable/Hempstead_BelmontStakesReducedService_June_11_2016.pdf.
Alcohol Prohibited on LIRR this Weekend, June 11-12

To maintain orderly travel for those attending the Belmont Stakes and Puerto Rican Day Parade, alcohol will not be allowed on LIRR trains, stations and platforms starting 7 AM Sat. June 11 through 11:59 PM Sun. June 12. MTA police will confiscate any alcoholic beverages brought onto the property.

Wassaic Branch Weekend Substitute Busing June 10-12

Weekend substitute bus service will be provided between Southeast and Wassaic for select trains on Friday evening, June 10, and all trains on Saturday and Sunday June 11 & 12 to accommodate reconstruction work for the Towners Crossing on Route 164. Buses will operate 15-30 minutes earlier than scheduled trains. Listen for announcements and check Local or Express bus service to your destination while boarding. See bus /train schedules at http://bit.ly/25zoyAJ We appreciate your patience during this service improvement.

E/B service will begin with the 2:52 PM train from Penn Station. Save money, buy rail tickets before boarding trains. For details, visit: http://web.mta.info/lirr/Timetable/BeyonceMets-Willets_June7-8_2016.pdf
